verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Every move I make I make in you newline You make me move, Jesus newline Every breath I take I breathe in you

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Every step I take I take in You newline You are my way Jesus newline Every breath I take I breathe in you

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Waves of mercy, Waves of Grace newline Everywhere I look, I see Your face newline Your love has captured me newline Oh my God this Love, how can it be?
